mapper.insert: insert into CMS_Account (AccountId, UserID, [Name], HashPassword, Status, CreateDate, Email, PhoneCountryNo, PhoneAreaNo, PhoneNo, FaxCountryNo, FaxAreaNo, FaxNo, MobilePhoneCountryNo, MobilePhoneNo, Version, DimissionReasonID, IsActiveDemission, DemissionDate, PasswordChangeDate, PasswordChangeNotifyStatus, Remarks, PositionChangeDate, IsUpdatedByExcel) values (#{accountId},#{userID},#{name},#{hashPassword}, #{status},#{createDate},#{email},#{phoneCountryNo}, #{phoneAreaNo},#{phoneNo},#{faxCountryNo},#{faxAreaNo}, #{faxNo},#{mobilePhoneCountryNo},#{mobilePhoneNo},#{version}, #{dimissionReasonID},#{isActiveDemission},#{demissionDate}, #{passwordChangeDate},#{passwordChangeNotifyStatus}, #{remarks},#{positionChangeDate},#{isUpdatedByExcel})
